snippet: Morgan Stanley has agreed to pay $200,000 to settle civil charges it exceeded speculative position limits in soybean meal futures for two days while attempting to hedge a commodity index investment, U.S. regulators said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Morgan Stanley Pays Fine After Index Hedge Topped Soymeal Limits
headline.main: Morgan Stanley Pays Fine After Index Hedge Topped Soymeal Limits

lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley has agreed to pay $200,000 to settle civil charges it exceeded speculative position limits in soybean meal futures for two days while attempting to hedge a commodity index investment, U.S. regulators said on Monday.
